name: uncaptioned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An uncaptioned picture or photograph has no caption (= text that describes the picture): The collection contains thousands of photographic prints, most of them uncaptioned.
An uncaptioned video or television show has no subtitles (= words at the bottom of the screen that show what is being said): He can lipread but sometimes has trouble understanding English, especially uncaptioned television.
More examplesFewer examplesThe text is prefaced by blurry black and white uncaptioned photos.The site also includes a collection of uncaptioned photographs of residents.They discriminate against the deaf community by providing video content that is either uncaptioned or inaccurately captioned.
